text: Andreas von Bülow (born July 17, 1937) is a German SPD politician and writer. He was born in Dresden. He has written books about September 11 conspiracy theories. From 1980 to 1982, he was the Minister of Research and Technology. ==Other websites== * Bülow´s speech at the Axis for Peace-Conference Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Dresden Category:Politicians from Dresden Category:Education ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Andreas von Bülow
